title: Update Documentation with Task Cleanup Service Details
description: Update the documentation files and README with comprehensive information about the Task Cleanup Service, including Mermaid logic flow diagrams and detailed explanations of the cleanup processes.

title: Create Mermaid Flow Diagrams for Task Cleanup Service
description: Design and create Mermaid flow diagrams showing the logic flow of the Task Cleanup Service, including hook integration, cleanup triggers, and the various cleanup operations.

title: Update README.md with Task Cleanup Service Documentation
description: Enhance the README.md file with comprehensive documentation about the Task Cleanup Service, including its purpose, configuration options, and usage examples.

title: Create API Documentation for Task Cleanup Service
description: Create detailed API documentation for the Task Cleanup Service in the docs/API.md file, including method signatures, parameters, return values, and examples of how to customize the cleanup behavior.

title: Enhance Documentation with Additional Mermaid Diagrams
description: Improve the existing documentation with more detailed Mermaid logic flow diagrams, focusing on specific cleanup operations and integration points. Add comprehensive visual representations of the Task Cleanup Service architecture and processes.

title: Create Detailed Cleanup Operations Flow Diagrams
description: Create detailed Mermaid flow diagrams for each cleanup operation (metadata consistency, duplicate detection, orphaned subtask handling, quality enforcement, and task ID reorganization) showing the step-by-step logic and decision points.

title: Add Integration Flow Diagrams
description: Create Mermaid diagrams showing the integration points between the Task Cleanup Service and other components of the system, including hook registration, event flow, and API interactions.

title: Update Configuration Schema Diagrams
description: Enhance the documentation with detailed Mermaid class diagrams showing the configuration schema for the Task Cleanup Service, including all options, their relationships, and inheritance patterns.
